alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lincoln County through 715 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Wallace to near Lake Maloney State Recreation Area. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Maloney State Recreation Area around 635 PM CDT. North Platte, Sutherland, Maxwell and North Platte Airport around 640 PM CDT. Hershey around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Coker, O`Fallons, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Keith, Birdwood and Somerset. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 155 and 195. Highway 83 between mile markers 54 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
